data.title: Michele Gibson OBITUARY
data.meta_description: In loving memory of Michele Gibson, wife of William Gibson, a couple residing in Scotts Valley, Ca. Michele passed away in Santa Cruz on the 21st of January
data.text:
In loving memory of Michele Gibson, wife of William Gibson, a couple residing in Scotts Valley, Ca. Michele passed away in Santa Cruz on the 21st of January, 2009. She will be deeply missed by all who knew her.

Michele had many sisters in the AA Society and was a friend to every dog on the planet. She is survived by her sister, Susan Bruniers and her husband Judge Terence Bruniers; her niece, Lisa Bruniers; her husband Bill and his children, John Gibson, Susan Ross, William Gibson, Margaret Ingraham, and Robert Gibson.

Services will be held for Michele on Saturday, January 24, 2009 at San Agustin Catholic Church, 257 Glenwood Dr., Scotts Valley, CA 95066. A Rosary will begin at 1:30 p.m. followed by the Funeral Mass at 2 oâ€™clock p.m. Arrangements are under the direction of Benito & Azzaro Pacific Gardens Chapel.
